title: Worlds Viewing Parties
body: Anyone know if there has been an announcements of viewing parties for worlds in the Newcastle/Sydney area?

replies.body: Yeah I knew a few cinemas did but im more looking for a pub or similar that is hosting it. Hopefully something pops up.
Last time for OCE finals there were viewing parties at cinemas. Is riot doing this again for the world finals?
i have been wondering this as well for a while now havnt found any information of the slightest
